name: The Nightshift v0.02
description:
Objectives:
  • Collect the red folders
  • Evade what's in the woods
Tips:

The folders are randomly generated, but each is either in or near a building. If anything spots you, it's best to break line of sight. Keep in mind that it'll remember where you were, so be sure to keep moving. They're faster than you too, try not to get caught in the open.

Controls:

WASD to move, F to toggle Flashlight, M to open Map, Escape to open menu
